author: Esmay Rosalyne
description:
Just when I thought I had somewhat recovered from the emotional rollercoaster that C.G. Drews put me through last year with their debut Don’t Let the Forest In, they are back to yet again tear my soul asunder with their newest botanical body horror Hazelthorn. title: REVIEW: Hazelthorn by C. G. Drews
